features: Torrent™ stretch fleece is extremely soft next-to-skin
Double needle cover stitch construction gives clean lines and a performance aesthetic
Trim, slim fit, increases breathability during high output
Gusseted underarms for mobility and comfort
Kissing Zipper chin guard protects chin and neck from zipper chafing
Torrent™—84% polyester 16% elastane. Moisture wicking, breathable, stretchy, jersey knit textile with a soft, brushed surface and a Polygiene® finish to manage odour.
